name: rs-nodejs2020
description: 1. Clone this repo 2. npm i 3. cd caesar-cli\ 4. How to use ## Cmd options   **-s, --shift**: a shift   **-i, --input**: an input file   **-o, --output**: an output file   **-a, --action**: an action encode/decode ```bash $ node caesar-cli -a encode -s 7 -i "./input.txt" -o "./output.txt" ``` or ```bash $ node caesar-cli --action encode --shift 7 --input input.txt --output output.txt ```
